div.p: Continuity of Education Plan and Other COVID-19 Communications

p.a: Community Update April 28, 2020 – Looking Forward to the 2020-2021 School Year
Continuity of Education Plan – Frequently Asked Questions
Updates on our Continuity of Education Plan April 19, 2020
Board Leadership Letter to the Community Regarding April Board Meetings
Update March 16, 2020 – Optional Independent Enrichment Learning Opportunities for UDSD students.
Please read this important update from the Upper Dublin School District related to the state-mandated school closure.

div.p: Our Registration page includes information for:

ul.li: Registration for the current school year
Kindergarten registration and new student registration for the 2020/2021 school year.

div.p: Please review the process for online registration before beginning the process. A checklist of required documents can be found here.
Please visit the SRMS Facility Project page for information.
Montgomery County Office of Public Health Regarding Coronavirus
